Package.Description: Analog countdown timer is a collaboration tool to organize time for meetings, workshops and activities. For example this tools is very useful for Agile/SCRUM ceremonies, Design workshops, time bound bran storm sessions etc. Initially needs for proper countdown timer came from my team and i to organize time bound meetings. So this tools is a solution and is freely availale for anyone who has the same need. It would be wonderful to have you feedback, Please send your feedback to amandegar@gmail.com. Tools just has developed and additional feature will add to next verisions very soon.
